      • isPlayersTurn

        public boolean isPlayersTurn(int playerID)
        Takes a playerID and responds whether it is that player's turn or not. ID system is base 0 so we don't need to subtract one from the currentTurn
        Parameters:
        playerID - the playerID to check
        Returns:
        true if it is the given player's turn, else false
